title: Слей шоу
overview: How can a young person navigate the maelstrom of information, whom to listen to, and how to understand the topic? In the new Slay Show on Suspilne, we will talk about trigger topics with young audiences in the format of vlogs. The host Mariia Tuchka aka TUCHA presents the show for those who want to understand what is happening and how to respond to current and discussed topics.In each episode, the host Mariia Tuchka will collect the most resonant topics for young people and reveal them at different levels. The programme will include short comments from experts and "people's polls".
